name: Bubble Pop! Shoot Bubbles
description:
Bubble Pop! Puzzle Game Legend is your classic bubble shooter game that’s highly addictive!
Train your brain to aim & shoot and burst & drop all the bubbles using epic blasters to clear the board and win coins!

Blast your way to victory in this explosive shooting game!
Simple to play and fun for all ages!

Don't miss out on this relaxing fun game, and download for FREE!


HOW TO PLAY
•Aim carefully and tap where you want to fire!
• Match 3 or more bubbles to make them pop!
• Use less shots to score higher and try to earn 3 stars.
• Create powerful boosters & items to help you blast through levels.

POWERFUL BOOSTERS
• Match 20+ bubbles to create a BOMB.
• Make 7 combos to create a BEAM SHOT.

FEATURES
• Hundreds of unique levels with various fun challenges!
• Easy to learn but difficult to master.
• No WiFi needed. Play anytime, anywhere.
• Play everyday to get special rewards!
• Soothing sounds and gorgeous visual effects.

NOTES
• Bubble Pop contains ads like banner, interstitial, video and house ads.
• Bubble Pop is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items like AD FREE and Coins.

E-MAIL
• help@bitmango.com

Have a pop at it!
Thank you for playing!
